alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong Winds and Increased Fire Danger This Afternoon... Strong westerly winds will continue this afternoon, for areas along and to the west of the I-25 corridor. Strongest wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph are expected, with possible isolated and brief gusts to 60 mph. Additionally, relative humidity values of around 20 percent will be possible in spots, helping to produce near critical fire weather conditions. Please use caution as increased fire danger is expected for a few hours this afternoon. If you are traveling across these areas, use caution and be prepared for sudden wind gusts, especially across north to south oriented roads.
